biotools.summary: OPUS-SSRI (Sparsity and Smoothness Regularized Imaging) is a stand-alone computer program for Maximum A Posteriori refinement of (multiple) 3D reconstructions in cryo-electron microscopy.

bioschemas.name: OPUS-SSRI
bioschemas.summary: OPUS-SSRI (Sparsity and Smoothness Regularized Imaging) is a stand-alone computer program for Maximum A Posteriori refinement of (multiple) 3D reconstructions in cryo-electron microscopy.
